效果 根白热的火焰爪从凤凰符文中喷出，对感应区内的一个生物造成@Damage[3d6[fire]]伤害。与此同时，发出一声500英尺内可听到的凤凰的尖鸣。感应区周围20英尺半径内的生物（包括触发生物）必须成功进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:16|name:Screeching Talon Deafened|traits:auditory]豁免，否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮。

Pile of Fireworks (3-4).name: 烟花堆 Pile of Fireworks (3-4)
Pile of Fireworks (3-4).disable: @Check[type:crafting|dc:18|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训)、@Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:16|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训)或@Check[type:explosives-lore|dc:16|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训) 以安全地移除点燃的烟火堆。或是@Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Remove Lit Fuse|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训)以从烟火堆中取走被点燃的引线。

Light Fuse.name: 导火索 Light Fuse
Light Fuse.description:
触发 烟花堆受到火焰或酸液伤害。

效果 其中一个烟花堆的引线开始燃烧，烟花堆立即进入先攻序列，位于触发生物或效果之前。

Explosive Blast.name: 爆炸冲击 Explosive Blast
Explosive Blast.description:
触发 烟花堆开始回合。

效果 烟花堆爆炸，对15尺内的所有生物造成@Damage[4d8[fire]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true])。

Pile of Fireworks (5-6).name: 烟花堆 Pile of Fireworks (5-6)
Pile of Fireworks (5-6).disable: @Check[type:crafting|dc:21|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训)、@Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:19|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训)或@Check[type:explosives-lore|dc:19|name:Remove Lit Firework] (受训) 以安全地移除点燃的烟火堆。或是@Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Remove Lit Fuse|traits:action:disable-a-device] (受训)以从烟火堆中取走被点燃的引线。

Light Fuse.name: 导火索 Light Fuse
Light Fuse.description:
触发 烟花堆受到火焰或酸液伤害。

效果 其中一个烟花堆的引线开始燃烧，烟花堆立即进入先攻序列，位于触发生物或效果之前。

Explosive Blast.name: 爆炸冲击 Explosive Blast
Explosive Blast.description:
触发 烟花堆开始回合。

效果 烟花堆爆炸，对15尺内的所有生物造成@Damage[6d8[fire]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true])。

Axe Vulnerability.name: 斧类易伤 Axe Vulnerability
Axe Vulnerability.description: 松树暴怒者会因斧类受到5点额外伤害。

Sap.name: 树汁 Sap
Sap.description:
松树暴怒者的树皮能分泌粘稠的树汁。任何以近战攻击命中它、或是被它命中、或是以其他方式接触了松树暴怒者的生物都必须成功通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:17]豁免，否则受到如同次等绊足包的效果，并且得到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}的状态直到移除这些粘液。使用武器或物体接触松树的生物可以通过将武器粘在松树上来自动通过此豁免，也可花费一个单动作通过@Check[type:athletics|dc:17|name:Unstick Object]再取回此武器。

松树暴怒者可同时粘住任意数量的物体，且它可以用一个动作释放一件被粘住的物体。在松树暴怒者死后一分钟内，树汁溶解。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.fYZIanbYu0Vc4JEL]{效果: 次等绊足包}

Port Peril Bar Fight (Last Catch) (1-2).name: 亡命港酒吧斗殴 Port Peril Bar Fight (最后的收获) (1-2)
Port Peril Bar Fight (Last Catch) (1-2).disable: @Check[type:intimidation|dc:17|name:Cow the Crowd]以吓阻一部分人群，或@Check[type:diplomacy|dc:20|name:Disperse the Crowd]以尝试平息斗殴。
Port Peril Bar Fight (Last Catch) (1-2).hazarddescription: 在一家亡命港酒馆的六个区域，一场酒吧斗殴爆发了，各色人等用互相挥拳，扔瓶子，以及其他形式加入骚乱。
Port Peril Bar Fight (Last Catch) (1-2).routine: (2动作) 酒吧斗殴的第一个动作是对未被解除的区域内所有生物进行一次大乱斗打击。对该区域的每个敌人进行一次打击，所有目标受到的伤害只需骰一次。酒吧斗殴的第二个动作是使用亡命港特色。

Port Peril Specialty.name: 亡命港特色 Port Peril Specialty
Port Peril Specialty.description: 只要尚未解除掉整个险情，酒吧斗殴就能够在酒吧里创造一个独特的效果，指定险情内部的任意一个位置（甚至可以是已经解除险情的区域）。每个效果的DC都是15。

strike-General Mayhem.name: 大乱斗 General Mayhem
strike-General Mayhem.description: 伤害可以是钝击、挥砍或穿刺。

Slippery When Wet.name: 小心地滑 Slippery When Wet
Slippery When Wet.description: 水飞溅，酒桶破裂，或是有水生血统的顾客施展了水系能力，导致4个连续的5英尺方格被覆盖@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{油腻术 Grease}效果。这个效果是最后的收获的专属特色。

Jinx Gone Wrong.description: 酒吧斗殴的某些原因招来了一场厄运的乱舞，导致一名角色的小腿撞在被推出的长凳上，或是被掉落的画框砸中脑袋。险情对一个生物施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kvm68hVtmADiIvN4]{嫉恨巫咒 Jealous Hex}。这个效果是利凡提的酒吧的专属特色。

strike-General Mayhem.description: 伤害可以是钝击、挥砍或穿刺。

Get the Goods!.name: 有好东西！ Get the Goods!
Get the Goods!.description: 赌博筹码，钱袋，或是断裂项链上掉出来的珠宝散落在地上。@Template[type:burst|distance:15]范围内，所有可能被物质财富吸引的生物必须尝试进行@Check[type:will|dc:15]豁免检定，以避免陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，持续1轮，或直到有生物耗用交互动作拾起这些财物。这个效果是哨塔的专属特色。

strike-General Mayhem.name: 大乱斗 General Mayhem
strike-General Mayhem.description: 伤害可以是钝击、挥砍或穿刺。

Get the Goods!.name: 有好东西！ Get the Goods!
Get the Goods!.description: 赌博筹码，钱袋，或是断裂项链上掉出来的珠宝散落在地上。@Template[type:burst|distance:15]范围内，所有可能被物质财富吸引的生物必须尝试进行@Check[type:will|dc:21]豁免检定，以避免陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，持续1轮，或直到有生物耗用交互动作拾起这些财物。这个效果是哨塔的专属特色。

Protoplasmic Extruder.name: 泥怪挤出机 Protoplasmic Extruder
Protoplasmic Extruder.disable: 两次@Check[type:occultism|dc:22|name:Disable Extruder|traits:complex,mechanical,magical,trap](专家)或一次@Check[type:thievery|dc:24|name:Disable Extruder|traits:complex,mechanical,magical,trap](专家)使其在下一回合失去动作。两次成功（或一次大成功）会使其完全失效；@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (3环；反制DC20)会使泥怪挤出机在下一回合失去动作，但不会使其失效。
Protoplasmic Extruder.hazarddescription: 泥怪挤出机是一个由金属和加固软管组成的直径20英尺的球形装置，能够从匡提姆的下水道吸取奥法泥浆，并将其转化成危险的泥怪。
Protoplasmic Extruder.reset: 泥怪挤出机必须用24小时提纯下水道的奥法泥浆才能重新激活。
Protoplasmic Extruder.routine:
(1动作) 在陷阱的先攻轮，它会在一个相邻的未占据方格里制造一只泥怪。当泥怪挤出机第一次使用这个动作时，会制造出一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.TZcDdN5o7s4alZNE]{胶质怪 Gelatinous Cube}，它会立即行动，之后在泥怪挤出机的先攻轮行动。在接下来的轮次中，泥怪挤出机改为制造@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Hkq9ZS2J2iKnT7vT]{下水道泥怪 Sewer Oozes}，并以相同方式行动。

泥怪挤出机产生的泥怪呈珍珠绿色；胶质怪失去了透明能力。所有由泥怪挤出机产生的泥怪都忠于欧何拉维兄妹并按照他们的命令行事。

泥怪挤出机在失效和重置前最多只能产生4只泥怪。
Protoplasmic Extruder.stealthdetails: (受训)；注意到泥怪挤出机的DC为0

Creator's Command.name: 建造者指令 Creator's Command
Creator's Command.description:
触发 比简·欧何拉维或载娜普·欧何拉维可以说话，并且在泥怪挤出机60英尺内骰先攻检定。

效果 泥怪挤出机开始运转地更吵，并骰先攻检定。

Efficient Capture.name: 高效抓捕 Efficient Capture
Efficient Capture.description:
需求 普提罗手持镣铐，并且和一个生物相邻；

效果 普提罗尝试用镣铐捆住该生物的双手或双脚。普提罗进行一次[[/r 1d20+9 #Manacles]]{+9调整值}的攻击检定对抗目标的AC，如果成功，则目标被套上镣铐。

Intimidating Strike.name: 胁迫打击 Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: 普提罗进行一次近战打击。如果命中且造成伤害，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，如果造成重击目标则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

Subdue Prisoners.name: 管束囚犯 Subdue Prisoners
Subdue Prisoners.description: 普提罗在使用棍棒进行非致命攻击时，攻击检定不受通常的减值。

Quagmire.name: Quagmire
Quagmire.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:15|name:Disturb Surface|traits:secret,action:sense-direction,exploration] (受训) to disturb the surface and make the quagmire plainly visible
Quagmire.hazarddescription: A patch of treacherous bog attempts to submerge creatures that step onto it。
Quagmire.reset: The hazard still submerges anyone who walks in, but the surface doesn't become hidden again until it settles over the course of 24 hours
Quagmire.routine:
(1动作) On its initiative, the quagmire pulls each creature within it 1 square toward the center of the quagmire and 1 step further submerged; a creature that is submerged up to its waist becomes submerged up to its neck, and a creature that is submerged up to its neck is pulled under and has to hold its breath to avoid suffocation。

A creature in the quagmire can attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:17|name:Swim Out of Quagmire|traits:environmental,hazard,action:swim] check to Swim to either raise itself by 1 step if its submerged to its neck or worse, or to swim out of the quagmire if its submerged up to only its waist. On a critical failure, the creature is pulled down 1 step. A creature that Swims out of the quagmire escapes the hazard and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} adjacent to the quagmire. Other creatures can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} the creature, typically by using a rope or similar tool, or attempt to pull a creature within their reach out with a @Check[type:athletics|dc:17|name:Pull Out of Quagmire] check, with the same results as if the creature attempted the check。

Rabid Squirrel Swarm.name: Rabid Squirrel Swarm
Rabid Squirrel Swarm.publicNotes: Swarms of centipedes are dangerous indeed, ravenous carpets of skittering hunger capable of devouring a traveler whole in a matter of minutes. Some alchemists submerge whole centipedes taken from swarms in their elixirs and some mutagens, claiming such infusions increase potency, though other say this is nothing more than quackish claptrap. Kobolds and mitflits are both known to incorporate swarms of centipedes into cunning traps, from simple pits filled with vermin or more complex affairs involving chutes that dump the vermin onto the heads of unwary intruders。

Raging Forest Fire.name: Raging Forest Fire
Raging Forest Fire.disable:
A successful @Check[type:athletics|dc:15|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire], @Check[type:nature|dc:15|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire], or @Check[type:survival|dc:15|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire] check from an adjacent square is sufficient to smother one 5-foot-square of fire; each attempt is an Interact action. Dousing the flames automatically extinguishes one or more sections of fire, with no check. Water typically clears a 5-foot square if the amount is small (such as that from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{Create Water} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}). Larger amounts of water, such as a full bucket, typically douse a 10-foot-by-10-foot area (or 4 squares in some other shape). Throwing a bucket of water on flames requires an Interact action. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VnPh324pKwd2ZB66]{Waterskin} doesn't contain enough water to put out even 1 square of fire。

Cold can also put out fire, but only if the cold can affect an area; cold is usually less effective than water, so a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{Frost Vial} typically puts out only 1 square of fire, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} is ineffective。
Raging Forest Fire.hazarddescription: A fire engulfs a 10-foot-by-10-foot section of forest, then spreads on each of its turns。
Raging Forest Fire.routine: On its turn, the fire spreads into a number of additional squares equal to half the number of squares the fire currently occupies, minimum 1 square. The GM determines the squares the fire spreads into. Any creature that ends its turn next to the flames takes @Damage[1d6[fire]]伤害, and any creature within the flames takes @Damage[4d6[fire]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:15|basic:true|name:Raging Forest Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire] save for both). A creature can take damage from flames only once per round。

Sap Life.name: 吸取生命 Sap Life
Sap Life.description: 如果拉尔蒂斯用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}至少对一名生物造成了伤害，他回复等于伤害术法术环级的生命值。

Necrotic Infusion.name: 死灵注能 Necrotic Infusion
Necrotic Infusion.description:
如果拉尔蒂斯的下一个动作是使用伤害术治疗单个不死生物，那么直到目标的下个回合结束，他的近战武器和非武装攻击造成额外@Damage[1d6[void]]伤害。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.bIU1q05vzkKBtFj2]{效果: 死灵注能}

Sap Life.name: 吸取生命 Sap Life
Sap Life.description: 如果拉尔蒂斯用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}至少对一名生物造成了伤害，他回复等于伤害术法术环级的生命值。

Raven Swarm (1-05).name: Raven Swarm (1-05)
Raven Swarm (1-05).publicNotes: A flock of ravens is known as an unkindness. Certainly the name lives up to its meaning when a swarm of ravens decides to work together. In most cases, a raven swarm like the one presented here won't attack larger foes, but when manipulated by supernatural forces or simple desperation born from hunger, an unkindness of ravens can be a surprisingly dangerous foe。

Ravenous Giant Centipede.name: 狂暴巨蜈蚣 Ravenous Giant Centipede

Ravenous Giant Centipede Venom.name: 狂暴巨蜈蚣毒 Ravenous Giant Centipede Venom
Ravenous Giant Centipede Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害 (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[1d12[poison]]伤害、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard} (1轮)

Reast Mycer (1-2).name: 里斯特·迈瑟尔 Reast Mycer (1-2)

Swear Vengeance.name: 复仇誓言 Swear Vengeance
Swear Vengeance.description:
触发 里斯特所能看到的生物，伤害了里斯特以外的格罗图斯的追随者。

效果 里斯特获得一个1级@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike}法术的效果。如果里斯特对触发生物以外的任何人进行攻击，则克敌机先结束，没有效果。

里斯特每天可以使用一次这个反应。

Reast Mycer (3-4).name: 里斯特·迈瑟尔 Reast Mycer (3-4)

Swear Vengeance.name: 复仇誓言 Swear Vengeance
Swear Vengeance.description:
触发 里斯特所能看到的生物，伤害了里斯特以外的格罗图斯的追随者。

效果 里斯特获得一个1级@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike}法术的效果。如果里斯特对触发生物以外的任何人进行攻击，则克敌机先结束，没有效果。

里斯特每天可以使用一次这个反应。

Channel Smite.name: 导能打击 Channel Smite
Channel Smite.description: 里斯特消耗一个准备好的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}，并进行一次近战打击。它的虚能伤害不是正常的法术效果，而是加在打击的伤害上。

Reefclaw (PFS 1-12).name: 礁爪怪 Reefclaw (PFS 1-12)
Reefclaw (PFS 1-12).publicNotes:
礁爪怪是形似大号虾或龙虾的水栖怪物。正如其名称中所叫的那样，礁爪怪的爪子是强有力的武器，能够牢固地钳住不幸的猎物并具备注射毒液的能力。

尽管礁爪怪无法说话，但他们却具有足够高的智能来理解狩猎场附近类人生物的当地语言。这些生物偶尔会偷听人们的对话，有时是为了获取伏击水生或陆生猎物的最佳地点，有时仅仅是为了找乐子——礁爪怪特别喜欢听声音尖锐的人说话。礁爪怪通常是独行的猎手，但人们也知晓会有一小群雌性礁爪怪会为了交配而围绕着单只雄性礁爪怪，或者聚集在一起共同养育后代。在后者的情况下，这些雌性会为了带回足够多的食物喂养后代而在较大的范围内进行狩猎。此类狩猎团体是极端危险的存在——他们会掀翻小渔船并攻击落入海中的人。

一旦礁爪怪定下了行动方针，他就会坚持到底，即便这么做意味着自身的死亡也无法改变。不止一名从礁爪怪爪下幸存的生还者说过，只有把礁爪怪的脑壳揍烂到漏出脑浆，才能让他松开夹断骨头的钳子，而且即便在濒死之际，礁爪怪也能在死亡之前打出可怕的最后一击。在交配季节，雌性礁爪怪通常会更加务实一些，在危及自身和后代之前释放他们的猎物。

尽管礁爪怪具备智能且会伴随着这股智能产生道德上的困惑，但他们却经常发现自身会被陆居猎手们捕杀并做成盘中餐，比如人类和大地精。具那些喜欢礁爪怪肉的人所说，这种肉的味道是甜味（在冷水中成长的礁爪怪）或者略带咸味（在温水中成长的礁爪怪）的美味。大多数了解礁爪怪具备智能的文明人会感觉食用他们的行为让人恶心，但这并不能阻止沿海地区的那些不讲道德的贵族，对他们来说礁爪怪肉是对得起相应价值的美味。同样，一心向钱看的渔民们也乐意捕猎这种危险的生物——或者，更好的做法是把这项任务派给那些天真的冒险者。

Death Frenzy.name: 拼死一搏 Death Frenzy
Death Frenzy.description:
触发 礁爪怪的生命值降至0点

效果 礁爪怪在濒死之前进行爪抓打击。

Reefclaw Venom.name: 礁爪怪毒 Reefclaw Venom
Reefclaw Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Rending Hands.name: 撕裂的手 Rending Hands
Rending Hands.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Exorcize the Spirits] (受训) 来安抚精魂。
Rending Hands.hazarddescription: 幻象手从地板撕出，抓向受害者的腿，并造成真实的伤口。
Rending Hands.reset: 潜在的精魂留存此处，在每个午夜重置作祟，直到这里发生的事情被公开为止。
Rending Hands.stealthdetails: (受训) 以听见地板下的抓挠声

Rending Hands.name: 撕裂的手 Rending Hands
Rending Hands.description:
触发 24小时内有生物再次通过区域C2。

效果 幽影的腐烂的手从目标身下的地板中钻出，抓挠它们的腿。这些手的外观根据作祟的原因有所变化（见下表）。

这些手造成@Damage[(4d6+10)[slashing]]和@Damage[4d6[bleed]]（@Check[type:will|dc:21|basic:true]豁免）。如果一个生物从作祟承受了任何伤害，这些爪子在目标的腿上留下撕裂的伤口，减少其陆地速度10尺（最低5尺），直到目标恢复到最大生命值为止。

业主 作祟表现
魔鬼大公信徒 硫磺的气味，以及炼狱语的哼唱（懂得炼狱语的PC，或者成功通过@Check[type:religion|dc:10|name:Recognize Chanting]，@Check[type:hell-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Chanting]{DC10地狱学识}，或者@Check[type:mephistopheles-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Chanting]{DC10梅菲斯托菲勒斯学识}检定的PC能辨认出该哼唱是向梅菲斯托菲勒斯的祷词）
缚魂玩偶制作者 腐烂的手上血肉剥落下来，露出里面的陶瓷（成功通过@Check[type:crafting|dc:10|name:Recognize Craftsmanship]或者@Check[type:occultism|dc:10|name:Recognize Craftsmanship]检定的PC，可以辨认出这是缚魂人形的制作工艺）
炼金实验家 化学品的气味盖住了腐烂，在手臂上可以看见精确的手术切口（成功通过@Check[type:crafting|dc:10|name:Recognize Cuts]或者@Check[type:medicine|dc:10|name:Recognize Cuts]的PC可以发现这些都是非必要的医疗手段）
奴隶主 这些手的手腕上仍然套着沉重的锁铐。
犯罪首脑 这些手上有纹身，并且有些完全没有手指（成功通过@Check[type:society|dc:10|name:Recognize Marks]或者@Check[type:underworld-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Marks]{DC10黑街学识}的PC可以辨识出这些是地震前活动的帮派标志
误入歧途的法莱斯玛追随者 在作祟消失的时候，一股熏香的味道残留下来（成功通过@Check[type:religion|dc:10|name:Recognize Rites]或者@Check[type:pharasma-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Rites]{DC10法莱斯玛学识}的PC可以辨识出这是法莱斯玛式葬礼用的气味）

Ruffian (Q11).name: Ruffian (Q11)
Ruffian (Q11).publicNotes:
Using their strength to bully others into submission, ruffians often work as bodyguards and enforcers for powerful criminals like charlatans and fences。

Some criminals are the desperate who have no option but to break the law to survive, while others choose a life of crime for thrills, forming gangs or underworld guilds that specialize in certain illegal ventures。

奴隶主 这些手的手腕上仍然套着沉重的锁铐。
犯罪首脑 这些手上有纹身，并且有些完全没有手指（成功通过@Check[type:society|dc:10|name:Recognize Marks]或者@Check[type:underworld-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Marks]{DC10黑街学识}的PC可以辨识出这些是地震前活动的帮派标志
误入歧途的法莱斯玛追随者 在作祟消失的时候，一股熏香的味道残留下来（成功通过@Check[type:religion|dc:10|name:Recognize Rites]或者@Check[type:pharasma-lore|dc:10|name:Recognize Rites]{DC10法莱斯玛学识}的PC可以辨识出这是法莱斯玛式葬礼用的气味）

Sea Devil Invader.name: 海魔鬼入侵者 Sea Devil Invader

Shark Commune 150 feet.name: 鲨鱼传心术150尺
Shark Commune 150 feet.description: 海魔鬼能够通过心灵感应与范围内的鲨鱼进行沟通。他只能传达简单的概念，如“来”、“保护”或“攻击”。

Aquatic Throwing.name: 水栖投掷 Aquatic Throwing
Aquatic Throwing.description: 当海魔入侵者从水下或是对着水下的生物使用投掷武器攻击时，它们投掷武器的射程单位不会减半。

Blood Frenzy.name: 血之狂乱 Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description:
需求 海魔鬼没有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}或已经陷入狂乱

触发 海魔鬼对活物造成流血伤害

效果海魔鬼陷入至少持续1分钟的狂乱。陷入狂乱后，海魔鬼使用啃咬或爪抓作出的攻击检定获得+1状态加值，啃咬或爪抓造成的伤害检定获得+4状态加值，获得11点临时生命值直至狂乱结束为止，并且AC会承受-2状态减值。海魔鬼无法自主停止狂乱。在狂乱之后，海魔鬼会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ScZ8tlV5zS0Jwnqn]{效果: 血之狂乱}

Bloodletting.name: 放血 Bloodletting
Bloodletting.description: 当海魔鬼造成穿刺或挥砍伤害时，若目标处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}或攻击造成重击，则还会造成@Damage[1d4[bleed]]伤害。

Season's Toll (3-4).name: Season's Toll (3-4)
Season's Toll (3-4).disable:
1 @Check[type:crafting|dc:25]或@Check[type:thievery|dc:25](专家)to rig up a dummy or other object to distract one of the trap's sensors, or

1 @Check[type:nature|dc:23] (受训) to temporarily befuddle one of the sensors with knowledge of primal magic。

Alternatively, inserting the correct key into an alcove's keyhole disables that alcove's sensor。
Season's Toll (3-4).hazarddescription: Arcs of primal energy emerge from the L-shaped stone wall at the center of each alcove。
Season's Toll (3-4).reset: The trap is powered by the Eternal Bloom. It resets after 5 minutes, at which time the doors to the vault slam shut once again。
Season's Toll (3-4).routine:
(4 actions) The trap loses one action per magical sensor disabled. On its initiative, the trap uses each of its actions to target one creature adjacent to or within an alcove with a negative effect that corresponds to the season opposite the one depicted on the alcove's murals (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] to resist). For the purposes of this trap, creatures who are within an alcove's landscape count are within that alcove. The trap can target only one creature per alcove per round。

Spring Alcove (death) The decay of late autumn takes hold of the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[2d6[void]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[void]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[void]]伤害 and [[/r 1d6[persistent,negative]]]伤害. Effects that use positive energy, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell, automatically end this persistent damage.

Summer Alcove (cold) Winter's bitter chill descends on the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[2d6[cold]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[cold]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[cold]]伤害;and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour.

Autumn Alcove (poison) Poisonous springtime pollen sprays at the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}.

Winter Alcove (fire) Heat greater than the hottest summer afternoon engulfs the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[2d6[fire]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[fire]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[4d6[fire]]伤害 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 hour.

Season's Toll (5-6).name: Season's Toll (5-6)
Season's Toll (5-6).disable:
@Check[type:crafting|dc:28]或@Check[type:thievery|dc:28](专家)to rig up a dummy or other object to distract one of the trap's sensors, or @Check[type:nature|dc:26] (受训) to temporarily befuddle one of the sensors with knowledge of primal magic。

Alternatively, inserting the correct key into an alcove's keyhole disables that alcove's sensor。
Season's Toll (5-6).hazarddescription: Arcs of primal energy emerge from the L-shaped stone wall at the center of each alcove。
Season's Toll (5-6).reset: The trap is powered by the Eternal Bloom. It resets after 5 minutes, at which time the doors to the vault slam shut once again。
Season's Toll (5-6).routine:
(4 actions) The trap loses one action per magical sensor disabled. On its initiative, the trap uses each of its actions to target one creature adjacent to or within an alcove with a negative effect that corresponds to the season opposite the one depicted on the alcove's murals (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] to resist). For the purposes of this trap, creatures who are within an alcove's landscape count are within that alcove. The trap can target only one creature per alcove per round。

Spring Alcove (death) The decay of late autumn takes hold of the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[(2d6+2)[void]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[void]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[void]]伤害 and [[/r 1d6[persistent,negative]]]伤害. Effects that use positive energy, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell, automatically end this persistent damage.

Summer Alcove (cold) Winter's bitter chill descends on the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[(2d6+2)[cold]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[cold]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[cold]]伤害 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 hour.

Autumn Alcove (poison) Poisonous springtime pollen sprays at the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[(2d6+2)[poison]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[poison]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[poison]]伤害 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}.

Winter Alcove (fire) Heat greater than the hottest summer afternoon engulfs the target。

  • 大成功 The trap has no effect.
  • 成功 The target takes @Damage[(2d6+2)[fire]]伤害.
  • 失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[fire]]伤害.
  • 大失败 The target takes @Damage[(4d6+4)[fire]]伤害 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 hour.

Light Weakness.name: 光亮弱点 Light Weakness
Light Weakness.description: 放出魔法光亮的物体（例如来自@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{光亮术 Light}）对幽影微灵造成额外伤害。

Shroud.name: 朦胧 Shroud
Shroud.description:
需求 该幽影微灵的上一个动作是一次对相邻生物的幽影触须打击，并且命中。

效果 该幽影微灵@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Steps}进入该生物的位置，并且尝试@Check[type:acrobatics]检定对抗目标的反射DC，以将自身附着在目标的影子上。

只要它保持附着，它随着目标移动，并且对该目标的攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。该目标可以在自己的回合里花费一个移动动作，尝试一次反射豁免，对抗该微灵的特技DC来逃脱此朦胧。

Stretch Shadow.name: 阴影扩散 Stretch Shadow
Stretch Shadow.description:
需求 该微灵附着在一个活物上。

效果 该幽影微灵钻入被附着的生物的影子，对其造成@Damage[1d6[void]]伤害。它可以使用被附着生物的影子，对另一个至多距离10尺的目标进行一次幽影触须打击。

Blood Magic.name: 血统奥秘 Blood Magic
Blood Magic.description: 当骷髅法师施放法术时，它选择一项：得到等于法术等级的临时HP持续1回合；或对一个目标造成等于法术等级的虚能伤害（若该法术本即造成虚能伤害，则将两者的伤害合计来计算弱点和抗性）。

Signature Spell.name: 标志性法术 Signature Spell
Signature Spell.description: 骷髅法师可以随意升阶其标志性法术。

Widen Spell.name: 扩展法术 Widen Spell
Widen Spell.description: 骷髅法师能令其施放的下一个法术影响更大范围。若其下一个动作将施放区域为爆发、锥形或直线，且没有持续时间的法术，则增加该法术的区域。为原本具有至少10尺半径的爆发区域增加5尺半径（原本半径更小则无效）、为原本长度不超过15尺的锥形和直线区域增加5尺长度、为原本半径更大的锥形和直线区域增加10尺长度。

Explosive Death.name: 死亡爆炸 Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description:
当骷髅被摧毁时，它的骨头会破碎然后爆炸，和支撑它的死灵能量一并放射出去。

相邻的生物受到@Damage[2d6[slashing]]伤害，@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|basic:true]豁免。

Gallop.name: 奔驰 Gallop
Gallop.description: 坐骑行走两次。每次移动的速度获得+10环境加值。

Undead Steed.name: 不死坐骑 Undead Steed
Undead Steed.description: 不死生物与其盟友无需进行技能检定就可以指挥骷髅坐骑。

Explosive Death.name: 死亡爆炸 Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description:
当骷髅被摧毁时，它的骨头会破碎然后爆炸，和支撑它的死灵能量一并放射出去。

相邻的生物受到@Damage[2d6[slashing]]伤害，@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|basic:true]豁免。

Bloody.name: 浴血 Bloody
Bloody.description: 这个骷髅浑身覆盖着鲜血，获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速治疗 Fast Healing 1}。

Explosive Death.name: 死亡爆炸 Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description:
当骷髅被摧毁时，它的骨头会破碎然后爆炸，和支撑它的死灵能量一并放射出去。

相邻的生物受到@Damage[1d6[slashing]]伤害 @Check[type:reflex|dc:10|basic:true]豁免。

Smoldering Forest Fire.name: Smoldering Forest Fire
Smoldering Forest Fire.disable:
A successful @Check[type:athletics|dc:13|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire], @Check[type:nature|dc:13|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire], or @Check[type:survival|dc:13|name:Smother Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire] check from an adjacent square is sufficient to smother one 5-foot-square of fire; each attempt is an Interact action. Dousing the flames automatically extinguishes one or more sections of fire, with no check. Water typically clears a 5-foot square if the amount is small (such as that from create water or hydraulic push). Larger amounts of water, such as a full bucket, typically douse a 10-foot-by-10-foot area (or 4 squares in some other shape). Throwing a bucket of water on flames requires an Interact action. A waterskin doesn't contain enough water to put out even 1 square of fire。

Cold can also put out fire, but only if the cold can affect an area; cold is usually less effective than water, so a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{Frost Vial} typically puts out only 1 square of fire, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} is ineffective。
Smoldering Forest Fire.hazarddescription: A fire engulfs a 10-foot-by-10-foot section of forest, then spreads on each of its turns。
Smoldering Forest Fire.routine: On its turn, the fire spreads into a number of additional squares equal to half the number of squares the fire currently occupies, minimum 1 square. The GM determines the squares the fire spreads into. Any creature that ends its turn next to the flames takes @Damage[1d6[fire]]伤害, and any creature within the flames takes @Damage[2d6[fire]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|basic:true|name:Smoldering Forest Fire|traits:hazard,environmental,fire] save for both). A creature can take damage from flames only once per round。

Sodden Floor.name: 浸水地板 Sodden Floor
Sodden Floor.disable: @Check[type:crafting|dc:16|name:Reinforce Compromised Floorboards] (受训)强化受损的地板。
Sodden Floor.hazarddescription: 这里的地板已经腐烂软化了，走上去的人会掉进洞里。

Crumble.name: 坍塌 Crumble
Crumble.description:
触发 一个生物进入存在浸水地板的空间。

效果 所有存在地板的空间内的生物必须尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:18]豁免。

成功 生物移动到最近的安全位置。

失败 生物坠落10尺，受到5点钝击伤害并倒地。

Spear Launcher (Q9:1-2).name: Spear Launcher (Q9:1-2)
Spear Launcher (Q9:1-2).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Disable Spear Launcher] (受训) on the floor tile or wall socket
Spear Launcher (Q9:1-2).hazarddescription: A wall socket loaded with a spear connects to a floor tile in one 5-foot square。

Spear Launcher (Q9:3-4).name: Spear Launcher (Q9:3-4)
Spear Launcher (Q9:3-4).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Disable Spear Launcher] (受训) on the floor tile or wall socket
Spear Launcher (Q9:3-4).hazarddescription: A wall socket loaded with a spear connects to a floor tile in one 5-foot square。

Spiky Pit (1-2).name: Spiky Pit (1-2)
Spiky Pit (1-2).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:12|name:Remove Trap Door|traits:mechanical,trap] to remove the trapdoor
Spiky Pit (1-2).hazarddescription: A wooden trapdoor covers a pit that's 10 feet square and 20 feet deep。
Spiky Pit (1-2).reset: Creatures can still fall into the trap, but the trapdoor must be reset manually for the trap to become hidden again。

Spiky Pit (3-4).name: Spiky Pit (3-4)
Spiky Pit (3-4).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:12|name:Remove Trap Door|traits:mechanical,trap] to remove the trapdoor
Spiky Pit (3-4).hazarddescription: A wooden trapdoor covers a pit that's 10 feet square and 20 feet deep。
Spiky Pit (3-4).reset: Creatures can still fall into the trap, but the trapdoor must be reset manually for the trap to become hidden again。

Spirit Guardian Statue.name: 精魂守望者雕像 Spirit Guardian Statue

Construct Armor (Hardness 6).name: 构装护甲 Construct Armor (硬度6)
Construct Armor (Hardness 6).description:
如同普通物体，精魂守护者雕像也具有硬度。此硬度可等值减少受到的所有伤害。

一旦精魂守护者雕像的生命值降低到其HP的一半以下，或是其受到了一次重击，它的构装护甲就会破损，失去此效果，且AC降低到16。

Follow Trespasser.name: 紧跟敌人 Follow Trespasser
Follow Trespasser.description:
触发 一个生物在精魂守护者雕像的触及内移动。

效果 雕像追着该生物移动最多20尺。

Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (5-6).name: Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (5-6)
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (5-6).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|trait:disable-device]或@Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:20|trait:disable-device] (受训) on each bush to collapse its acid pump into component parts (2 actions per bush)。
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (5-6).hazarddescription:
Four techno-organic "bush" structures featuring mini-acid pumps activate. The first lashes out with sharp "branches" as it activates, and then all of the bushes spit acid at movement nearby。

HP is 10 per bush with a BT of 5
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (5-6).routine: (3动作) The trap loses 1 action each turn for each bush disabled. On each of the hazard's actions, one of the functional pumps spits acid at a creature within range. The bushes sense movement, only targeting creatures that moved from their space on their most recent turn. This trap does not attack any single creature more than once per round. It does not take a multiple attack penalty。

Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (7-8).name: Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (7-8)
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (7-8).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|trait:action:disable-device]或@Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:23|trait:action:disable-device] (受训) on each bush to collapse its acid pump into component parts (2 actions per bush)。
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (7-8).hazarddescription:
Four techno-organic "bush"; structures featuring mini-acid pumps activate. The first lashes out with sharp "branches" as it activates, and then all of the bushes spit acid at movement nearby。

HP is 14 per bush with a BT of 7
Spitting Acid 'Bushes' (7-8).routine: (3动作) The trap loses 1 action each turn for each bush disabled. On each of the hazard's actions, one of the functional pumps spits acid at a creature within range. The bushes sense movement, and they only target creatures that moved from their space on their most recent turn. This trap does not attack any single creature more than once per round. It does not take a multiple attack penalty。

Squirrel Swarm (1-04).name: Squirrel Swarm (1-04)
Squirrel Swarm (1-04).publicNotes: Swarms of centipedes are dangerous indeed, ravenous carpets of skittering hunger capable of devouring a traveler whole in a matter of minutes. Some alchemists submerge whole centipedes taken from swarms in their elixirs and some mutagens, claiming such infusions increase potency, though other say this is nothing more than quackish claptrap. Kobolds and mitflits are both known to incorporate swarms of centipedes into cunning traps, from simple pits filled with vermin or more complex affairs involving chutes that dump the vermin onto the heads of unwary intruders。

Statue Of Set.name: 赛特雕像 Statue Of Set

strike-Flaming Coal (Brazier Extinguishe.name: 燃煤 Flaming Coal (火盆熄灭)

Construct Armor (Hardness 10).name: 构装护甲 Construct Armor (硬度10)
Construct Armor (Hardness 10).description:
L和普通物品一样，赛特雕像具有硬度。硬度可降低它受到的任何伤害，降低数值等于硬度值。

一旦雕像的生命值被降到一半以下，或者受到重击的伤害，其构装盔甲便会破损，防御等级降低到20点。

Brazier.name: 火盆 Brazier
Brazier.description:
雕像携带一个装满炽热煤炭的大火盆。在发动燃煤打击或使用焚身时，雕像必须在一只手中持有火盆，或者火盆要在其触及范围之内。

生物可以不以雕像为攻击目标，而是改为直接攻击火盆。火盆具有和雕像相同的AC和豁免。

对火盆造成15点寒冷伤害或浇上至少2加仑水可以熄灭煤炭，这将阻止雕像继续使用焚身，并使它的远程攻击不再能造成2d8点火焰伤害。

Burn Alive.name: 焚身 Burn Alive
Burn Alive.description: 雕像将它已擒抱的生物塞进装着炽热煤炭的火盆。目标受到@Damage[3d6[fire]]伤害和[[/r 1d8[persistent,fire]]]伤害。

Steaming Fields (5-6).name: Steaming Fields (5-6)
Steaming Fields (5-6).disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:26](专家)twice to navigate a safe path
Steaming Fields (5-6).hazarddescription: A field of warm mist covers an open plain. Pockets of highly pressurized steam lie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} in the earth; pressure releases jets of steam。
Steaming Fields (5-6).stealthdetails: (受训) to see steam vents erupting

Steaming Fields (7-8).name: Steaming Fields (7-8)
Steaming Fields (7-8).disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:30](专家)twice to navigate a safe path
Steaming Fields (7-8).hazarddescription: A field of warm mist covers an open plain. Pockets of highly pressurized steam lie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} in the earth; pressure releases jets of steam.
Steaming Fields (7-8).stealthdetails: (受训) to see steam vents erupting

7Kzas1XFgp87Z0nN.name: 快速愈合 2 (位于帕拉瓦克斯的灵光中)

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 钢魔蝠喷出一片碎铁渣，对@Template[type:cone|distance:15]区域内的生物造成@Damage[2d4[slashing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免）。在豁免中失败的生物还会受到@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。钢魔蝠必须间隔[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}才能再次使用喷吐。

Storm Smite.name: 风暴惩击 Storm Smite
Storm Smite.description:
触发 风暴侍祭的弯刀打击造成重击；

效果 风暴侍祭释放出以目标为中心的@Template[type:burst|distance:10]闪电。范围内，除了该风暴祭司以外的生物受到@Damage[1d6[electricity]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|basic:true]豁免）。大失败的生物还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮。

Storm Warrior-Priest.name: 风暴战斗祭司 Storm Warrior-Priest

Storm Smite.name: 风暴惩击 Storm Smite
Storm Smite.description:
触发 风暴侍祭的弯刀打击造成重击；

效果 风暴侍祭释放出以目标为中心的@Template[type:burst|distance:10]闪电。范围内，除了该风暴祭司以外的生物受到@Damage[2d6[electricity]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:15|basic:true]豁免）。大失败的生物还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1轮。

Submerged Shard.name: 淹没碎片 Submerged Shard
Submerged Shard.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:13|name:Blunt Crystal] (受训) 以磨钝水晶边缘从而免于受伤。
Submerged Shard.hazarddescription: 一块巨大的、锯齿交错的透明水晶从海底伸出，它有10尺见方，40尺高。
Submerged Shard.reset: 碎片持续对进入的生物或物体造成伤害，但不会再次隐藏起来，直到1分钟后归于平静。

Shard.name: 碎片 Shard
Shard.description:
触发 一个生物或物体移动进入碎片的位置。

效果 触发生物受到@Damage[(2d6+5)[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免）。

Summoning Rune (PFS 1-11).name: Summoning Rune (PFS 1-11)
Summoning Rune (PFS 1-11).disable: @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:15]以在不触发陷阱的情况下接近，然后@Check[type:thievery|dc:17] (受训)以抹除符文，或用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (1st level; counteract DC 15) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune (PFS 1-11).hazarddescription: A cloud of invisible magical sensors covers four squares on the map. One of these hazards is in the squares directly above each of the four yellow runes on the map, and the other is in the squares directly above each of the four blue runes on the map。
Summoning Rune (PFS 1-11).reset: The trap resets each day at dawn。

Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (1-2).name: Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (1-2)
Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (1-2).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Disable Floor Panels|traits:mechanical,trap] (受训) on the floor panels before the barrel falls
Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (1-2).hazarddescription: Pressure sensitive panels in the floor connect to a barrel of debris hidden in the hallway's ceiling

Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (3-4).name: Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (3-4)
Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (3-4).disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Disable Floor Panels|traits:mechanical,trap] (受训) on the floor panels before the barrel falls
Trapmaster Tok's Surprise (3-4).hazarddescription: Pressure sensitive panels in the floor connect to a barrel of debris hidden in the hallway's ceiling

Treacherous Quagmire.name: Treacherous Quagmire
Treacherous Quagmire.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:18|name:Disturb Surface|traits:secret,action:sense-direction,exploration] (受训) to disturb the surface and make the quagmire plainly visible。
Treacherous Quagmire.hazarddescription: A patch of treacherous bog attempts to submerge creatures that step onto it。
Treacherous Quagmire.reset: The hazard still submerges anyone who walks in, but the surface doesn't become hidden again until it settles over the course of 24 hours
Treacherous Quagmire.routine:
(1动作) On its initiative, the quagmire pulls each creature within it 1 square toward the center of the quagmire and 1 step further submerged; a creature that is submerged up to its waist becomes submerged up to its neck, and a creature that is submerged up to its neck is pulled under and has to hold its breath to avoid suffocation。

A creature in the quagmire can attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Swim Out of Quagmire|traits:environmental,hazard,action:swim] check to Swim to either raise itself by 1 step if its submerged to its neck or worse, or to swim out of the quagmire if its submerged up to only its waist. On a critical failure, the creature is pulled down 1 step. A creature that Swims out of the quagmire escapes the hazard and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} adjacent to the quagmire. Other creatures can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} the creature, typically by using a rope or similar tool, or attempt to pull a creature within their reach out with a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20|name:Pull Out of Quagmire|traits:environmental,hazard,action:aid] check, with the same results as if the creature attempted the check。

Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-01).name: 无敌蛮力丧尸 Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-01)
Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-01).publicNotes:
死灵法术增强了这具丧尸的体型和力量。

丧尸唯一的欲求便是啃食活物。丧尸作为永不停歇地蹒跚前行且不会思考的死亡之兆，只有将其摧毁才能使之停步。

Slow.name: 缓慢 Slow
Slow.description: 丧尸具有永久性的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Corpse Throwing.name: 投掷尸体 Corpse Throwing
Corpse Throwing.description: 丧尸巨人能向敌人投掷尸体。笨重丧尸能向敌人投掷尸体。尽管任何中型的死尸都可以用于投掷，但它们有时会投掷@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.0plBflWwrCWQO2RO]{蹒跚丧尸 Zombie Shamblers}，这时蹒跚丧尸会承受与被投掷命中目标相同的伤害。被投掷的蹒跚丧尸会以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态落地，但如果它没有被摧毁的话，则可以如常使用其他动作和起身。

Wide Swing.name: 大幅摆动 Wide Swing
Wide Swing.description: 笨重丧尸可以用血肉团块进行一次打击，并用攻击结果与至多2个敌人进行比较，每个被攻击的目标都必须在打击的触及范围内。此次攻击在计算笨重丧尸多次攻击减值时被视为2次攻击。

Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-13).name: Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-13)
Unkillable Zombie Brute (PFS 1-13).publicNotes:
Necromantic augmentations have granted this zombie increased size and power。

丧尸唯一的欲求便是啃食活物。丧尸作为永不停歇地蹒跚前行且不会思考的死亡之兆，只有将其摧毁才能使之停步。

Vengeful Spirits.name: 复仇精魂 Vengeful Spirits
Vengeful Spirits.disable: 两次@Check[type:occultism|dc:26|name:Exorcise the Haunt|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]或@Check[type:religion|dc:26|name:Exorcise the Haunt|traits:hazard,haunt,complex] (受训)可以驱散精魂。一个角色也能以以下方式对精魂造成4点心灵伤害，或是使驱散检定的DC永久降低1点。这些方式包括安抚精魂的@Check[type:diplomacy|dc:22|name:Calm the Spirits|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]，念诵社神守护咒的@Check[type:nature|dc:22|name:Ward Against the Spirits|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]，说破精魂由来的@Check[type:occultism|dc:20|name:Leverage Haunt Lore|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]，进行小型驱魔法的@Check[type:religion|dc:22|name:Lesser Exorcism to Weaken the Haunt|traits:hazard,haunt,complex]。任何被精魂惊吓到的生物都会成为对精魂造成的伤害的潜在目标，力场和类似伤害会同时伤害精魂和宿主，心灵伤害和命能伤害则仅在宿主主动接受时才会对宿主生效。
Vengeful Spirits.hazarddescription: 一群邪恶的灵魂袭击那些穿行于森林中旅客的心灵。这些精魂首先用自己死亡时内脏的幻象折磨其宿主，然后强迫他们对自己造成一样的创伤重现其死亡。被精魂惊吓到的生物仿佛在一瞬间戴上了面具，那面具上长着角和獠牙，还有黄色的眼睛。
Vengeful Spirits.routine:
(3动作) 在其先攻顺序上，精魂使用前两个动作以尝试恐吓区域内尚未受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}状态的随机目标。目标必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:22|name:Resist Terror|traits:emotion,fear,mental,hazard,haunt]豁免。

大成功 目标不受惊惧且免疫此精魂24小时。

成功 目标受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 目标受到惊惧1，在目标回合结束时，所受惊惧的数值不会自动减少1点。改为目标在回合结束时进行@Check[type:will|dc:18|name:Reduce Frightened|traits:emotion,fear,mental,hazard,haunt]豁免，成功则移除此状态。

大失败 目标受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。在目标回合结束时，所受惊惧的数值不会自动减少1点。改为目标在回合结束时进行@Check[type:will|dc:18|name:Reduce Frightened|traits:emotion,fear,mental,hazard,haunt]豁免，成功则移除此状态。

随后精魂花费1个动作强迫已受惊惧的生物用森林残骸伤害自己。生物必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:22|name:Resist Attacking Yourself|traits:emotion,fear,mental,hazard,haunt]豁免否则在其下个回合中的第一个动作必须用来打击自己。这种力量为精魂所推动，用精魂的下列数据进行检定。请注意，惊惧状态同时作用于攻击检定和AC，所以不会影响攻击自己的命中率。

Visions of Death.name: 死亡幻象 Visions of Death
Visions of Death.description:
触发 三个或更多生物进入此区域；

效果 鬼面出现，精魂投掷先攻。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 狐狸行走并在移动结束时进行一次打击。如果狐狸在开始此动作时藏匿，则它保持藏匿直到打击结束后。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 凶暴狡狐对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外1d4精准伤害。

Weak Arboreal Warden.name: 弱化树精卫士 Weak Arboreal Warden

equipment-Large Bark Shield.name: 大皮盾 Large Bark Shield
equipment-Large Bark Shield.description:
虽然它们的形状和尺寸各不相同，但木盾提供的保护来自其材料的坚固性。虽然木盾比钢盾便宜，但它们更容易破损。

硬度 HP BT
3 20 10

Axe Vulnerability.name: 斧类易伤 Axe Vulnerability
Axe Vulnerability.description: 树精卫士被斧类武器攻击命中时受到额外5点伤害。

Shield Push.name: 举盾猛推 Shield Push
Shield Push.description: 树精卫士行走并进行一次盾击打击。如果攻击命中，则目标被推离10尺。

Weak Ceustodaemon (PFS 1-01).name: 弱化仆役邪魔 Weak Ceustodaemon (PFS 1-01)
Weak Ceustodaemon (PFS 1-01).publicNotes:
仆役邪魔由各种邪恶的凡人灵魂形成，尤其是那些试图加速自己死亡让自己变成邪魔仆从的人们。他们超凡的感官让他们在守护宝库或主物质位面的其他类似的地点时非常有用。仆役邪魔是为侍奉而生的，但是总是在想方设法挣脱束缚，因此它们可能会撕裂召唤它们的凡人的肉体。最邪恶的召唤者把仆役邪魔释放到凡间有时仅仅是为了取悦末日荒原的邪恶力量。

作为荒凉恐怖的末日荒原的居民，邪魔被塑造成致力于于毁灭一切形式的生命。它们会尝试用最痛苦和最恐怖的方式杀死每个凡人，所有这些都是为了服侍被称为天启的四驭者（Four Horsemen）。每一种邪魔代表一种不同的死亡方式，它们的力量几乎总是为了传播这种特定的死亡方式而存在。通过这种力量，它们试图把所有生灵都拖入绝望的深渊，并让所有灵魂泯灭。

虽然那些把邪魔召唤到主物质位面的人通常会利用这些生物的破坏力和腐化能力来达到自己的目的，但是邪魔们自身也在不断寻找传播恐惧、怀疑和绝望的方法。通常邪魔会隐藏自己的阴谋并替其他魔族（fiends）办事，这造成的混乱会加剧凡人们的恐惧。

虽然所有邪魔族都会试图引诱凡人们堕入邪道，用这种方法增加自身的数量和自己家乡位面的力量，但是邪魔对凡人灵魂的渴望则更进一步，并会使用各种方法——尤其是狂躁邪魔的灵魂宝石——来引诱他们。在末日荒原以及其他很多多重宇宙中令人生畏的国度里，灵魂是美味的飨宴、是交易的货币同时也是魔法力量的源泉。而邪魔则是所有这些地方的居民中最强大的食客、商人和灵魂“资源”的使用者。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
该仆役邪魔喷出@Template[type:cone|distance:30]火焰。在锥形范围内的生物承受@Damage[6d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]豁免）。

该仆役邪魔以及在豁免中失败的生物会着火，承受[[/r 1d6[persistent,fire]]]伤害。

该吐息在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用。

Drawn to Service.name: 乐于侍奉 Drawn to Service
Drawn to Service.description: 当施展类似@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{异界誓缚 Planar Binding}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vgy00hnqxN9VoeoF]{异界盟友 Planar Ally}之类的仪式将仆役邪魔召唤到其他位面时，该仪式的主要检定或次要检定技能DC减少5，并且仆役邪魔的服务只需要正常开销的一半。

Vicious Wounds.name: 恶毒之伤 Vicious Wounds
Vicious Wounds.description:
当仆役邪魔的咬打击或爪打击成功时，仆役邪魔会恶毒地撕裂猎物，它的身躯上会出现类似的伤口。目标受到额外[[/r 1d6]]{1d6伤害}，仆役邪魔也受到同样的额外伤害。

如果该额外伤害因为重击变为双倍，则仆役邪魔同样受到双倍伤害。

Weak Green Hag.name: 弱化绿鬼婆 Weak Green Hag
Weak Green Hag.publicNotes:
绿鬼婆憎恨美丽和纯洁，所以她们用伪装和背叛来引诱和谋杀无辜者、腐蚀纯洁的西陵、破坏受害者的思维和道德观念。绿鬼婆会想出各种各样的阴谋来彻底毁掉任何与她作对的人，还有那些善良或正直的人，他们的存在对绿鬼婆扭曲的情感是一种侮辱。绿鬼婆会制造持续不断的错综复杂的丑闻，包括冒名顶替、身份错误、对所爱之人的引诱和背叛，或者所有这些事情。

鬼婆是潜伏在文明边缘的恶毒老巫妪，用她们具有欺骗性的魔法能力来捕食、操纵和腐蚀类人生物。有些人说鬼婆是由内心自私扭曲的邪灵产生的。女巫聚集成巫团能形成更强大的力量，她们制造被称为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{鬼婆之眼 Hag Eyes}的独特魔法物品，同样出名的是会把婴儿替换成自己的后代——便是所谓的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.bAjHCeyNcPRqOmLv]{替换儿 Changelings}。这些替换儿有很大的可能性成为新的鬼婆。

Coven.name: 巫团 Coven
Coven.description:
绿鬼婆能将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{纠缠术 Entangle}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{流放诅咒 Outcast's Curse}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{棘墙术 Wall of Thorns}添加到巫团法术中。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

Sound Imitation.name: 仿声 Sound Imitation
Sound Imitation.description: 绿鬼婆可以通过一次成功的欺骗检定，以说谎动作模仿巢穴附近的任意动物。她在此上检定有+4环境加值。

Betraying Touch.name: 背叛之触 Betraying Touch
Betraying Touch.description: 绿鬼婆触碰一个没有把她当做敌人的生物。被背叛的生物受到她的衰竭体液影响，并且豁免检定有-4环境减值。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
绿鬼婆能变化成任意中型女性类人生物。这不会改变她的速度或它打击的攻击加值和伤害加值，但是能改变她打击的伤害类型（例如钝击）。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Enfeebling Humors.name: 衰竭体液 Enfeebling Humors
Enfeebling Humors.description: 被绿鬼婆爪抓伤害的生物必须进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1天。如果大失败，或者被鬼婆命中时豁免再次失败，则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1天。

Exhale Miasma.name: 呼出瘴气 Exhale Miasma
Exhale Miasma.description:
绿鬼婆呼出一阵绿色的瘴气。@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内的生物都受到衰竭体液的影响（正常进行豁免）。

她在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}之内无法再次使用该能力。

Weak Soulbound Homunculus.name: 弱化缚魂人造人 Weak Soulbound Homunculus

Homunculus Poison.name: 人造人毒素 Homunculus Poison
Homunculus Poison.description:
一只人造人在它头部的蓄水腔内存有一剂毒药，它可以以一个交互动作从它的储备中补充这种毒药。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:13]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

Weak Spider Swarm.name: Weak Spider Swarm
Weak Spider Swarm.publicNotes:
An abundance of food, the sudden hatching of a clutch of eggs, or magical influence can cause smaller spiders to gather in terrifying, deadly masses。

Few everyday vermin inspire as much dread as the infamous spider。

Whispering Souls.name: 低语灵魂 Whispering Souls
Whispering Souls.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:19|name:Supress the Spirits] (受训) 来抑制住精魂，或者@Check[type:performance|dc:19|name:Drown Out the Spirits] (受训) 把它们拉出幻觉。
Whispering Souls.hazarddescription: 迷惘的幽灵低语着，展现着他们的最后时刻，并将生者拖入他们的幻觉中。
Whispering Souls.reset: 潜在的精魂留存此处，在每个午夜重置作祟，直到这里发生的事情被公开为止。

Luring Whispers.name: 诱惑低语 Luring Whispers
Luring Whispers.description:
触发 多个生物在区域C4停留超过6秒。

效果 这些低语变得更加迫切，直到房间里的每个角色尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:21]豁免。

在失败时，生物会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮（或者在大失败时[[/br 1d6+1 #rounds]]{1d6+1轮}）。此困惑效果的胡言乱语和作祟的来源相关。

主人 低语和咕哝
魔鬼大公信徒 竭尽全力赞美梅菲斯托菲勒斯。
缚魂玩偶制作者 乞求着“不要让我再进人偶里面了”
炼金实验家 狂乱地喊着不想永远活下去
奴隶主 各种语言的请求被释放
犯罪首领 保证不再给家族添乱
误入歧途的法莱斯玛追随者 想要得到安息的叹息

Witchwyrd (PFS 1-21).name: Witchwyrd (PFS 1-21)
Witchwyrd (PFS 1-21).publicNotes:
Witchwyrds conceal most of their faces, leaving only their eyes unmasked. Their inscrutability is a boon to one of their most significant interests-mercantilism- and many haughty witchwyrds openly revel in the befuddlement inspired by their mysterious guises and mannerisms. Witchwyrds have a keen eye for new opportunities and markets, and a witchwyrd almost always knows when someone is trying to pull one over on them。

These four-armed humanoid creatures have hairless blue-gray skin, are typically 6-1/2 feet tall, and weigh 300 pounds. Their hands have three evenly sized and spaced digits in a tripod-like arrangement. When not trying to blend in with the local community, witchwyrds favor outlandish, loose-fitting clothes in bright reds or yellows and a signature conical hat. They tend to prefer the driest, warmest regions of the lands they visit-perhaps an indicator of their mysterious home world. This, however, is the only indicator; witchwyrds are notoriously close-mouthed about details of this distant world, and with good reason: most witchwyrds on Golarion have never visited their ancestral home. To these witchwyrds, the notion of a home planet is a constant thorn in their side, and when asked, many choose to ignore the question altogether. Others are so agitated by these queries that they respond with impatience or even violence. Some scholars have theorized a connection between witchwyrds and several other four-armed creatures, but like with questions of their place of origin, witchwyrds have little to say about the topic。

Young Bloodseeker Swarm.name: 觅血群 Young Bloodseeker Swarm
Young Bloodseeker Swarm.publicNotes: 蜈蚣群确实很危险，它们像飞掠而过的贪婪地毯，能在几分钟内吃掉旅行者。一些炼金术士把从蜈蚣群里取来的整只蜈蚣浸泡在他们的灵药和一些突变药剂里，声称这样可以增强效能，但另一些人认为这不过是江湖庸医的噱头。狗头人和怯懦小魔怪都会狡猾地把蜈蚣群放进陷阱里，从装满害虫的简单陷坑，到更复杂的把害虫倾倒到粗心的闯入者头上的滑槽。

Swarming Bites.name: 虫群噬咬 Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: 集群范围内的每个敌人受到@Damage[1d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）和[[/r 1[persistent,bleed]]]伤害。觅血群获得等同伤害值的临时生命值。被吸血的生物流失1，直到它得到治疗。

Young Sea Serpent.name: 幼年海蛇 Young Sea Serpent

Spine Rake.name: 棘刺刮擦 Spine Rake
Spine Rake.description: 幼年海蛇将它背部的棘刺张开，并游泳或行走。在此行动期间任何时刻和大海蛇相邻的生物都必须受到@Damage[(1d4+2)[slashing]]伤害 (@Check[type:reflex|dc:14|basic:true]豁免)。

Young Sea Serpent Algae.name: 幼年海蛇藻毒 Young Sea Serpent Algae
Young Sea Serpent Algae.description:
海蛇脖子周围的器官里充满了能影响精神的藻类。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|name:Young Sea Serpent Algae Poison]

最大持续时间 3轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}并且如果目标飞行，则浪费它每轮的第一个动作用于下降20尺 (1轮)

Zombie Brute (PFS 1-18).name: Zombie Brute (PFS 1-18)
Zombie Brute (PFS 1-18).publicNotes:
Necromantic augmentations have granted this zombie increased size and power。

丧尸唯一的欲求便是啃食活物。丧尸作为永不停歇地蹒跚前行且不会思考的死亡之兆，只有将其摧毁才能使之停步。

Rotting Aura.description:

在丧尸10尺内且生命值不满的生物在回合开始时会因伤口溃烂受到[[/r 1d6]]{1d6伤害} as its wounds fester. Creatures that take a critical hit from the zombie also take this damage immediately。
